casebody.data:
175 A.3d 168 KEVIN DUGAN, PLAINTIFF, AND ROMAN ZIELONKA, PLAINTIFF, v. BEST BUY CO. INC., AND GARRETT HETRICK, DEFENDANTS.

M-344 September Term 2017

080016 November 17, 2017

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion of the New Jersey Civil Justice Institute for leave to appear as amicus curiae is granted, limited solely to the filing of the brief that accompanied the motion.
